Uses of Package
com.payu.ratel.context

  • Packages that use com.payu.ratel.context 
    Package Description
    com.payu.ratel.client  
    com.payu.ratel.context
    This package contains classes used by the tracing mechanism.
  • Classes in com.payu.ratel.context used by com.payu.ratel.client 
    Class and Description
    RemoteServiceCallEvent
    Event raised on client side when Ratel client invokes a remote service.
    RemoteServiceResponseEvent
    Event raised on client side when Ratel client receives a response from a remote service.
    ServiceInstanceCallEvent
    An event risen when a particular service instance is called on server side.
    ServiceInstanceResponseEvent
    An event that is risen when a particular instance of a service returns a result (or throws exception) after handling a request.
  • Classes in com.payu.ratel.context used by com.payu.ratel.context 
    Class and Description
    ProcessContext
    A context of a process that is always available via ProcessContext.getInstance().
    ServiceCallEvent
    An event that is risen when a service is called.
    ServiceCallInput
    Java form of a payload send to a remote service.
    ServiceCallResult
    Event with payload of remote service call, already serialized to java form.
    ServiceEvent
    Abstract class representing any event that is risen when communication with service happens on either server or client side.
    ServiceResponseEvent
    An event that is risen when a service returns a result (or exception) after handling an event.
